title: Button Functionality Test for Empresas-
description: Verify that buttons on the page at https://www.bancsabadell.com/txempbs/P4CDNLanding.init.bs?portal=card-catalog&version=0&initialData.segmento=empresas&segmento=Empresas function correctly
steps: Click each button one by one
Observe the response to each button click
expected_results: Each button triggers the expected action
UI responds appropriately to button interactions
No errors occur during button operations
